author: archiron
body:
Minor modifications in OvalFiles were made to take into account the possibility to make several comparison (i.e. 7_5_0_pre2 vs 7_4_0_pre9_ROOT6 and 7_5_0_pre2 vs 7_5_0_pre1 into the 7_5_0_pre2 folder) in one folder.

No changes have been made elsewhere
title: Electron Validation OvalFile Modifications
